text.emotional: [happiness, low]To make transport easier, you may want to own a pickup truck to load the pallets onto . You can, of course, deliver them with the tractor and pallet fork.[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} to make transport {..} easier {...} you may want to own a pickup truck to load the pallets onto {....} you can of course deliver them with the tractor and pallet fork {...}
